summary: REQ-4 appears implemented by conditionally displaying "$15.00" in the Wallet page “Available Balance” card when the logged-in principal matches the specified identifier, otherwise showing "$0.00". No clear missing requirements from the provided diff summary, but some additional non-requested repository metadata files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository metadata/summary files not requested by REQ-4 (frontend file summaries and project state tracking).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a UI display change in frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx; changes to documentation/state tracking files are not part of the stated requirement.
